thread.title: Shandong Shanda Wit Science and Technology to acquire 1.1 mln shares of biopharmaceuticals unit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Shandong Shanda Wit Science and Technology to acquire 1.1 mln shares of biopharmaceuticals unit

organizations.name: shandong shanda wit science and technology co ltd
shandong shanda wit science and technology

text:
Feb 13(Reuters) - Shandong Shanda Wit Science and Technology Co Ltd
* Says it plans to acquire 1.1 million shares of Shandong-based biopharmaceuticals unit
* Says it will hold 52.1 percent stake (32.3 million shares) in the unit after acquisition
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Z3h21T
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
